Description.Text: Located to the East of Mallorca in the Bay of Cala Millor, we can boast of the privileged place, to be located in first-line of beach, between two walkways of 1st and 2nd line views of the totally clear Mediterranean Sea, from which our clients can see strolling to the passers-by, sail boats or sighting the charming and attractive beach of Cala Millor, with its pineda of background. Hotel Playa del Moro is a hotel with great charm renovated completely in 2002 and in constant renewal. He is certified by the "Q" of tourist quality, which offers a service of high standards. Recently in ISO 14001-2004 has certified by demonstrating that it is a friendly hotel with the environment. We offer a variety of services for customers today. With a modern SPA and Wellness offering different variety of treatments, Sauna, Turkish bath, heated pool and jacuzzi. The restaurant with terrace gives the option to the client to breakfast or dinner overlooking the sea. The bar offers all kinds of drinks and cocktails. Bikes are rented, there are excursions offer and organized shows at night with free access. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi in all installations, also provided towels free of charge for the pool. The wake-up service is free. The beach is 30 meters has parasols and hammocks to enjoy the Sun. 100 Meters is the public transport and also in the hotel you can rent a car for excursions more prolonged. Right next to the hotel is a shopping area with shops, restaurants and cafs. All rooms have: Satelite TV and music Channel; Satety deposit box; telephone; air conditioning and central heating; hair-dryer, minibar. All sea view and Junior Suites have a bath robe and a sofa couch.

Cala Millor is one the most developed tourist zones in the whole of Mallorca. Its tourist growth began at the end of the 50s, beginning of the 60's and continues. It is presently one of the most well known and preferred destinations for the European tourist.

Standard Room - All rooms have: Satellite TV and music Channel; Safety deposit box; telephone; air conditioning and central heating; hair-dryer, minibar. All sea view and Junior Suites have a bath robe and a sofa couch.
